scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, depicted as a saint, stands holding a staff in his right hand and a blue, jeweled book in his left. He wears a golden miter with decorative elements and a rich, red cloak over a golden tunic. The background is a stylized landscape with rolling hills, scattered trees, and small buildings, suggesting an outdoor setting. The saint is illuminated with a golden halo, indicating his holy status.
